body.quiz:
In the blanks, write the correct noun form. Be careful with spelling!

For example:
Noun: pars, partis f. share, part
English: Genitive plural f.
Latin Answer: partium

Latin Noun to UseIdentificationLatin Answer
Arx, arcis f. citadelAccusative singular f.*_
Navis, navis f. shipAblative singular f.*_
Canis, canis m. dogGenitive plural m.*_
Pars, partis f. shareDative singular f.*_
